mapper.insert: insert into delieverresume (id, sno, projectName, sName, sMajor, pid, tno, content, mark,mentor) values (#{id},#{sno},#{projectName},#{sName},#{sMajor},#{pid},#{tno},#{content},#{mark},#{mentor});
mapper.select: select id,sno,projectName,sName,sMajor,pid,tno,content,mark,mentor from delieverresume where sno = #{sno} and mark = 1;
select id,sno,projectName,sName,sMajor,pid,tno,content,mark,mentor from delieverresume where sno = #{sno} and mark = -1;
select id,sno,projectName,sName,sMajor,pid,tno,content,mark,mentor from delieverresume where sno = #{sno} and mark = 0;
select id,sno,projectName,sName,sMajor,pid,tno,content,mark,mentor from delieverresume where sno = #{sno} and pid=#{pid} and mark = 1;
select id,sno,projectName,sName,sMajor,pid,tno,content,mark,mentor from delieverresume where sno = #{sno} and pid=#{pid} and mark = -1;
select id,sno,projectName,sName,sMajor,pid,tno,content,mark,mentor from delieverresume where sno = #{sno} and pid=#{pid} and mark = 0;
